content.content: MIP40c3-SP81: Modify Core Unit Budget (SF-001)  Preamble MIP40c3-SP#: 81 Author(s): Deimos Contributors: Tags: core-unit, cu-sf-001, budget, dai-budget, mkr-budget Status: RFC Date Applied: 2022-08-10 Date Ratified: Forum URL: https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mip40c3-sp81-modify-core-unit-budget-sf-001/17135 Ratification Poll URL:    Sentence Summary MIP40c3-SP81 removes all and any active budgets for the Strategic Finance Core Unit—Dai or MKR.  Specification  Motivation This Core Unit has net negative. More can be read here: MIP39c5-SP1: Core Unit Offboarding (SF-001).  Core Unit ID SF-001  Budget Implementation On this proposal’s approval:  No more Dai will be transferred for the use of this Core Unit, either through streaming or through direct payments. No more MKR will be vested. Unvested MKR will be forfeited.   Golden Parachute During the RFC phase, the community can propose any type of one-time compensation to be included with this subproposal. Discussions are underway for Strategic Happiness we can borrow ideas.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal to modify the budget of a Core Unit in MakerDAO. The author explains the proposal and its motivation, and provides details on the budget implementation. A 3rd party can give constructive criticism, ask questions, or audit and review the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This is a summary of the potential impact of this proposal, from GovAlpha’s perspective:  This is a valid offboarding proposal under the currently approved governance process  The Facilitator offboarding, budget modification, and Core Unit offboarding subproposals aim to offboard the Strategic Finance Core Unit (SF-001). If the offboarding proposal is ratified, the existing DAI and MKR vesting streams will be cancelled. This proposal asks the Community or SF-001 CU to propose an adequate severance plan for the contributors. No execution plan is provided. This proposal has been assigned High-Impact based on the methodology listed here.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
None of the topics listed match

content.content: Reminder that this proposal will enter its Frozen Period in one week, on Thursday September 1 at 00:00UTC. Substantive modifications beyond that time will render the proposal ineligible for the upcoming Governance Cycle / reset its Frozen Period, as the case may be.
